channel.title: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
channel.description: Hey. Ive been adding shops for a while, and Im, well, sick of making an npc and it not having a trade option and having to search for one. I was wondering how to make an npc like Santa trade. I'd make the shop, give the items to the npc, and make it in the client (Ive made 5 shops that work... So i know how to make them) and they dont trade. Do I have to do something in the dialoguehandler section? Please help. Thank you.

item.title: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

Javacisnotrecognized:

You can’t do that, trading is a special thing in the client which you can only be notified of if the thing is actually tradable. That’s why every server isn’t noclipped, the client checks if you are walking somewhere valid then the server does the same. Same deal for trading.

WRONG
I won’t explain everything but heres what you need to do.
After youve added the shop and everything, the shop ID and stuff in the shops.cfg, and in the client.java, you need to add the shop keeper with the OTHER SHOP KEEPERS in the autospawn.cfg file. DO NOT ADD THE SHOP KEEPER AT ANY RANDOM PLACE, IT WILL NOT WORK. YOU MUST ADD HIM WITH THE OTHER SHOP KEEPERS.
Preferrably in the middle of all the shop keepers
Save, compile, then run

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?

item.title: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Uuuh I run it before I first compile when I make shops with a trade option and they work…

item.title: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
item.dc:creator: @bludwow0 bludwow0
item.description:
@bludwow0 wrote:

dont open runserver untill your finished… this is wat u should do…

  1. autospawn.cfg
  2. add a new npc to where u want.
    3.shop.cfg
    4.add items
    5.compile+run
  3. should work…

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?

item.title: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Yes. I can give an example. My steps of what i do are here.

1.Open autospawn.cfg.
2.Add a new NPC to where I want it.
3.Run server to make sure its added. If not, I redo. If so, I continue.
4.I open up shop.cfg.
5.I add the items I want.
6.I open up client.java.
7.I search for wanneShop. I scroll down to the last one.
8.I then add all the stuff needed.
9.Compile and run.
10.Go on server and test. It doesn’t work!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make NPCs without the Trade option Trade when you click on them?
